评论详情: true to size and good material. held up well in washer and dryer. Love the little puff sleeve.
Loved the slightly puffed sleeves. Excellent value.
I bought it, for my granddaughter. Good over all quality and she loved it.
In the picture the shirt looked more dressy bc of the sleeves.  In person, it was a very casual looking shirt.
This is a very pretty little top and very soft.  Fits true to size.  Not your average t-shirt.  Very dressy.  Great purchase.
Color was fine. thin fabric. I have returned it
Fits my tween daughter nicely.
Cheap material, balls up and picks. Not a fan.
Fabric could have been a little  heavier
Girls' puff long sleeve is a perfect fit and comfortable. I like the closed cuff and puff on the shoulder. My daughter loves the color, but the thickness of the material could be better.
Me encantó la tela para mi niña y es la talla correcta que viene
The size was a little off. But I probably didn't measure her right
I loved them looked so cute on my Grand Children
Muy bonoto
The material is super thin and borderline see through.

Extremely disappointed in the shirt. I had planned to buy all three of my great goddaughters this top for Christmas however, I purchased one for one of my three for her birthday to go with her leggings. This shirt online is so cute and it looks like it shimmer or has velvet sleeves, it is nothing more than a T-shirt?? And not a good quality one at that it was thin, nothing like the photo, a plain crewneck T-shirt poor Quality and not flattering unfortunately I ordered it right before the birthday party so I had no time to exchange it. I will not ever purchase this item again so buyer beware it looks nothing like the picture you can buy a higher quality T-shirt from children’s place for five bucks

评论概述: Runs small, not a tunic lenght
评论详情: The description stated this was a tunic but the length was the same as a T-shirt. Also was way too small for my normal size 8 year old.
Great color, decent fit (a little long for my short torso kiddo) but we are kinda used to that. otherwise, good quality.
This long-sleeved blouse is cute and fits true to size. The material is rather thin, however, and  the wearer may need an undershirt or cami beneath it.

Color is as expected.  The shirt is a bit thin, so not great if you live in a cold place, but should be okay in warmer weather or as a layer.  It does have very long arms/sleeves (one might be slightly longer than the other) and thick wrist cuffs, but does have room for her to grow into it.

I got the size 14 for my ten-year-old, who is wearing a size 14-16, and it fits her quite well. The sleeves are a bit baggy, but she likes it and says she especially loves the puffed sleeves and can wear them for her school uniform. The sleeves are gathered at the shoulder and the wrist and there is a gather on the back making it extra cute. The material is soft, but it is too thin, and she doesn't like that she has to wear a shirt under it because of that.

This is a very cute girly-girl long sleeve casual crew neck shirt. I’m not a big fan of synthetics unless they are blended with cotton, and a rather large amount of cotton, but this has me impressed. Made of 79% Polyester, 16% Viscose and 5% Eiastane the combination of these synthetics makes for a soft and warm fabric that feels good to the touch. The quality of stitching is excellent through out all parts of the shirt. Following the laundering instructions I washed & dried it twice and it held its shape and color. I bought this for my 12 year old niece and the measurements are as follows: The shoulder width  seam to seam is 12.5", the sleeve length seam to end of cuff is 21" and the length from  the front of the crew neck down to the bottom of the shirt is 20". It came with lots of wrinkles in it (due to packaging) and I found I had to iron it on a setting between delicate fabrics and wool with steam to get them out. I have a steam iron and that setting worked pretty good. You may have to play around with your iron settings before ironing the shirt. I chose the purple color and in the picture with the little girl the shirt appears to have a sheen to it or a glistening look to it and it does not.

This shirt was not what I expected at all. First of all, the fabric looks nothing like the fabric in the pictures. There is no shine to it at all. It's a cotton shirt. Second, I somehow got the wrong size. I don't know if that was an error on my part or the seller's but I thought I ordered a size 7-8 and I got a 13-14 instead and so there is no way this is going to fit my daughter... for years. It's huge on her. The fabric feels nice though, even if it is a little thin. And I like that the sleeves have tight cuffs to keep them from falling off. But, unfortunately, I can't really give a complete review of this shirt because it doesn't fit.

评论概述: i love the sleeves of this shirt
评论详情: the sleeves are comfy and the texture feels perfect. its great for winter but i used it in the summer and it still felt nice to wear.
So cute love the shirt fit my daughter beautifully! Nice material great quality!!
This shirt is really soft, my daughter loves it. It held its color in the wash and didn't bleed on anything. The purple color is true to the image and the shirt is true to size.

This top is adorable! It's thin, but not see-through, so it's the perfect weight for Fall or Winter in Texas!  It doesn't stretch out of shape when washed, however, I didn't put it in the dryer. Since it arrived vacuum sealed, I wanted to try to remove some of the wrinkles. But I didn't want to risk it shrinking until I know if it will fit my granddaughter. The wrinkles came out in a short wash, and I hung it up to dry immediately. A few hours later I could see a bit of the "sheen" of the fabric, which is quite pretty. I ordered red, which has a hint of pink in it, but not too much. It's a lovely color!  I'm quite impressed with this top, so I hope to find more from this manufacturer before Christmas!
Shirt following the sizing guide. Fabric is a tad thin but my daughter loved it!

My daughter loves this shirt. It's one she wants to wear every other day. It is true to size. It has held up well to washing with no shrinkage or fraying. The current price is just under $9. I feel that is a very justifiable price for this shirt. Very happy all around with this purchase.

We used this top for a family photo shoot and it worked out perfectly. Sizing ran true, and the shirt is made of a lightweight material that drapes well. The sleeves dress it up a little bit. I love the heathered maroon color.

评论概述: Cute, dressy long sleeve t shirt
评论详情: This is a true to size dressed up long sleeve t shirt.  Cute sleeves and cute in the back, these details dress up the shirt so it's not just a plain long sleeve t shirt.  The material feels soft.  The white one is slightly see through, so might want your daughter to wear an undershirt.  Not a deal breaker to me, because most white shirts are like that.

Very nice casual earthy green color long sleeve top.  The fabric is ultra soft, lightweight, thin but not see through material & super comfy. I couldn't believe how accurate the size chart is in the site - fits like a glove! I'm a small/petite woman where sometimes girls sizes fit well, and this is one of them. If you want to get this for your girl, don't hesitate, as this is a very nice top and would highly recommend it.
Cute, Comfortable, and as pictured. Fit is true to size. The material is soft and appears to be durable.

Most online blouses don’t lay on the collarbone like they do on the models, but this one is true to the cut and stitching. The fabric is buttery soft, and the torso is long enough to where I don’t worry about her belly showing. A definite staple for the upcoming cold weather!

Our granddaughter really likes gathered puffy sleeves.  This has the feminine touch of puffy sleeves.  It is lightweight, soft and stretchy.  It is true to size and will be a nice addition to her fall wardrobe.

评论概述: granddaughter enjoys wearing it: comfortable, causual, and versatile
评论详情: Very cute white top for a girl. My granddaughter really likes this. She often wears it to school, usually with a pair of jeans. She says it's comfortable. And it looks like it too.  She could also wear it to slightly fancier occasions (not that she has too many). Because it's also versatile -- can work for casual occasions and more.  It's pretty stylish, but not overly ostentatious. Slightly overstated.  She got the white one. Which, again, looks nice. And this is coming from a girl who is becoming increasingly picky. So her endorsement does mean something.  It's also good value at an affordable price. Overall, we'd recommend it.
I bought this for my granddaughter who will be turning 8 years old this week. The 7/8 size is a little big on her and will give her some growing room. She likes the sky blue color.
True to size, my daughter loved it, fabric is thick, soft, lightweight, fresh and very comfortable to wear, good quality and better value

I got this long sleeve shirt for my daughter and she absolutely loves it. The soft and comfortable fabric is perfect for everyday wear, whether she's at school or playing with friends. The puff sleeves add a cute and trendy touch that my daughter absolutely adores.

This puffed-sleeved shirt is good for layering or wearing alone. It can be tucked in or left out. It is made of a nice medium thick material that is just slightly transparent. My daughter is 53 inches and 70 lbs and we ordered a 9-10. The shirt fit just right, the sleeves came down to her lower wrist and shirt fell to her upper thigh.The picture doesn’t really serve it any justice but can say it is true to color to what is advertised. (Light blue) The price is just right; coming in at under $10.

I ordered the sky blue choice for my granddaughter who is 5 1/2 years old. The top is easy care for laundry. The fabric is soft and is stretchy. The cuffs are terrific for keeping the sleeves from hanging too long and dragging in to stuff. It’s also nice to fold the cuff up when needed. It’s a good fit on my granddaughter when room to grow without being too baggy on her.
My 6 year old likes this shirt.  It's basic, but the material is nice.  Great for school or kicking around on the weekends.

I'm happy and so is my granddaughter with Haloumoning Girls Puff Long Sleeve Shirt.  The fabric is light enough to be comfortable.  This is a basic top you may dress up or down.  It is soft and not itchy.  Easy wash and dry.  True to size.
